job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Little Rock, AR
pros: Great family environment. Staff and management are just wonderful. Very flexible and will work with your schedule.
Laid back environment; Casual dress code.
cons: Upper management not the best. Same people doing the same thing for years. No Diversity in Management especially the Executive Team.
Leadership needs to see what is going on outside the exec offices

pros: Family oriented, the doctors were very comfortable to work with, team work was okay.
